title: Netflix’s New Strategies to Lure and Keep Subscribers
description:
After months of losing ground to competitors, Netflix looks to be turning things around. The streaming giant has set its sights on expanding its base of subscribers and earning more revenue from the ones it has. WSJ reporter Sarah Krouse joins host Zoe Thomas to discuss Netflix’s strategy and what comes next as it works to maintain its position in the streaming wars.
